description_en:
Introduction:
Prepared on Talh wood for 3 days and blended with carefully cleaned and dried imported herbs and brightening powders. Our formula is designed to both cleanse and promote a brighter, more even-looking skin tone. Safe for sensitive skin and free from preservatives.

Benefits:
- Deep cleansing and gentle exfoliation to remove dead skin cells.
- Helps reduce the appearance of body lines and uneven tone.
- Assists with ingrown hairs and can slow hair regrowth over time.
- Ideal for pre-laser preparation (use 3 days before laser to help remove hidden hair).

Usage:
Use twice a week. Each pack contains 10 balls â€” use the amount appropriate for your body size. For best results, follow with a moisturizing lotion after showering. Results may be noticeable from the first use for many customers.

Storage:
Store frozen or in a very cold place to preserve freshness and texture. Do not expose to heat.

description_en:
Introduction:
Handmade from fresh ingredients with a focus on skin-brightening and nourishment. Key ingredients include frankincense, natural honey, milk, cream, natural oils, and vitamins.

Benefits:
- Helps lighten and even the skin tone.
- Effective for reducing body acne, marks, and uneven texture thanks to the healing properties of frankincense.
- With regular use, customers report smoother skin and improved tone in problem areas.

Usage:
- Daily cleansing: Use every day with a gentle loofah or sponge for best results.
- Mask treatment: Optionally leave as a 3â€“5 minute mask on damp skin before rinsing for a deeper treatment.

Storage:
Keep in a cool, dry place. Allow soap to drain and dry between uses to extend its life and preserve texture.

description_en:
Introduction:
Made with rose oil, special brightening and moisturizing oils, raw shea butter, natural vitamin E, rose extract, and rose water. This soap is formulated to brighten, soothe redness, and improve skin texture. Ideal for bridal routines and everyday pampering.

Benefits:
- Brightens and soothes irritated or red skin.
- Helps reduce body acne and marks while improving overall texture.
- Deeply moisturizing for a soft, glowing finish.

Usage:
Use daily as a gentle wash, or apply as a 3â€“5 minute mask for added treatment. Use with a soft loofah for best results.

Storage:
Store in a cool, dry place and allow the soap to drain and dry between uses to prolong its life.

description_en:
Introduction:
Formulated with turmeric, frankincense, fruit acids, brightening powders, and vitamins. This active scrub is designed to exfoliate and brighten the skin while nourishing it with potent natural ingredients.

Benefits:
- Exfoliates and removes dead skin cells for a smoother appearance.
- Helps treat keratosis pilaris (chicken skin) and reduces blackheads.
- Brightens and nourishes the skin with active ingredients.

Usage:
Apply to the body and leave for 10 minutes, then rinse thoroughly. Use up to twice a week. Avoid using the scrub on the same day as the Dalkah.

Storage:
Store in a cool, dry place. Keep the container sealed and avoid exposure to moisture to preserve the formula.

description_en:
Introduction:
A must-have for brides and those seeking a lasting glow â€” this lotion brightens, evens skin tone, and leaves a long-lasting, beautiful scent. Formulated with natural honey, milk, vitamins, and specialized brightening oils.

Benefits:
- Brightens and evens the skin for a radiant finish.
- Deeply moisturizes and leaves skin soft and smooth.
- Provides a subtle, long-lasting fragrance suitable for special occasions.

Usage:
Apply twice daily to clean skin and massage until fully absorbed. Use more generously on areas needing extra glow.

Storage:
Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight to preserve scent and efficacy.

description_en:
Introduction:
A gentle, natural alternative to traditional Dalkah â€” these imported bridal herbs are blended to help brighten and even skin tone while nourishing the skin.

Benefits:
- Natural brightening and evening of skin tone.
- Helps lift dead skin and reveal smoother, softer skin.
- Nourishing botanical action for healthier-looking skin.

Usage:
Take an amount suitable for your body and mix with water or yogurt until a paste forms. Apply all over the body and leave for 5â€“10 minutes to allow absorption. Scrub/roll to remove dead skin and rinse thoroughly.

Storage:
Store in a cool, dry place. Not suitable for pregnant women.

A curated set to give you a glowing, even-toned look for special occasions.

description_en:
Introduction:
A luxurious bridal fragrance crafted with vanilla, amber, woody notes, musk, patchouli, and oud. Designed to be long-lasting and unforgettable for special occasions.

Benefits:
- Long-lasting fragrance that complements bridal attire.
- Elegant, layered notes for a refined and memorable scent.

Usage:
Apply to pulse points such as wrists and neck. Reapply as desired for a stronger presence.

Storage:
Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight to preserve scent quality.
